action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,

Please create the following categories in the preview Smile catalogue to go live 26 May.

Please add the following sub-folders and the contents to each tile. Files can be downloaded here: UNITRON SMILE LAM ASSETS

  1. After the 'POS' category, please create a new category titled 'Local Marketing'. In this category, please create a tile for each of the folders shown below using the same folder titles and add the contents in each of the folders to each tile.



  1. After the 'Local Marketing' category, create a new category titled 'Website and Social Media' and create tiles for each of the following folders. Add the files for each to their respective tile. with same and it's contents.

  1. After the 'Website and Social Media' create a new category titled 'Images' and create tiles for the following folders and add the files in each to each tile.



  1. After the 'Images' category, create a new category titled 'Videos and create a tile for the following folder with the same title and add the files to the tile.


Please let me know of any issues.




Best regards,

Nikki Ozeken
Customer Marketing & Value Added Services Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd

AU
Phone: +61427017997
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
Email: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com
